## Source: ossf-package-analysis (04b6d15db941f1d01e071a3963afdf3c69fd65a8915f7c611d7fbbb40fab2d00)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'codeql-extractor-iac-action' @ 6.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
